short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to enhance Kindle Cloud Reader

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kindle+ allows you to customize your experience when using Kindle Cloud Reader. You can Hide books from the library view, and when reading a comic or manga, you can edit it's brightness, contrast, and even it's reading direction.
